description:
Kingdom Hearts RE Chain of Memories is an action card RPG following
Sora on his journey through Castle Oblivion to find Riku and Kairi.
game: Kingdom Hearts RE Chain of Memories

1.0.0.description:
-Added logic for Final Marluxia
-Allow players to set their starting CP
-Added a battle tutorial intro skip
-Added a setting to withhold checks from being behind the Leon sleight tutorial
-Changed to include the Pluto friend card to open Castle Oblivion.  Pluto is always obtained from Larxene 2

----------
### How to play (GBA COM):
1. Download the khcom.apworld file and connector_khcom.lua script
2. Place your khcom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
3. Place your connector_khcom.lua script in your lua folder (usually /data/lua/)
4. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
5. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
6. Find "Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
7. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
8. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
9. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
10. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
11. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
12. Click "KHCOM Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
13. Open Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories in BizHawk
14. On the title screen, navigate to Tools > LUA Console
15. In the LUA Console window, navigate to Script > Open Script
16. Open /data/lua/connector_khcom.lua
17. Confirm the script is running by verifying the script is listed in your active scripts and a green triangle appears before the script name
18. Play!

### How to play (RECOM):

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC Release via Epic Games Store and navigate to your KH_1.5_2.5 in the path box and click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check ReCoM plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure LUA backend", then click "Next".
- Ensure that "Launch via Epic Games" is checked and click "Next"
- Extract game data for ReCoM and any other AP game you play (KH2), then click "Next".
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Re:Chain of Memories"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-RECOM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your khrecom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts RE Chain of Memories.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KHRECOM Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

-  You begin the game as normal in Traverse Town on Floor 1.
- You start with a Key of Beginnings, Key of Guidance, and Key to Truth for Floor 1, as well as infinite (non-gold) map cards of each type and value.
- Collecting battle cards in the overworld WILL NOT ADD THEM TO YOUR INVENTORY.
- In GBA COM, story and card journal entries are checks
- In RECOM, opening Room of Beginnings, Room of Guidance, and Room of Truth on each floor as well as card journal entries are checks.
- In RECOM, you must fight the between-floor bosses in order.  They will not appear otherwise.
- You are allowed to warp to any floor at the start.
- Floors which you don't have unlocked are simply assigned Traverse Town.
- If card packs are on (GBA ONLY), some locations hold card packs, which are the only way to obtain battle cards. These card packs come in three varieties: bronze, silver, and gold
- If card sets are on, some locations locations hold sets of specific cards (Kingdom Key 4-6 for example).  These are the only way to obtain battle cards.
- Friend cards (Aladdin, Ariel, Beast, Donald, Goofy, Jack, Peter Pan) are randomly placed at checks. 
- In GBA COM, when you have found all 7 friend cards, you win.  
- In RECOM, when you have found all 7 friend cards and defeated all floor bosses, F13 is opened.  Defeat Marluxia 1 on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- In RECOM, these friend cards are tracked in your journal instead of your inventory.

----------

### (RECOM) All of my cards are missing!
RECOM works by parsing the items from the client in real time, you must have the client open and connected to progress.  As soon as you reconnect, you'll see your items again and won't have lost any progress. 

### (RECOM) I have an error on startup.
If you receive an error when starting you game, ensure that your paths in KH_1.5_2.5/LuaBackend.toml have quotes around them, both for RECOM and any other game that lists paths for scripts.  If not, please add them.

### (RECOM) I want to play vanilla again.
If you want to return the game to its original state, uninstall the mod via OpenKH.

----------

### (GBA) Card Packs:
### Bronze
- Most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Kingdom Key, Three Wishes, Pumpkinhead, Olympia, Wishing Star, Lady Luck, Potion, Hi-Potion, Ether, Fire, Blizzard, Thunder, Simba, Genie, Cloud, Dumbo

### Silver
- Second most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Lionheart, Metal Chocobo, Spellbinder, Divine Rose, Crabclaw, Mega-Potion, Elixir, Mega-Ether, Cure, Stop, Gravity, Aero, Bambi, Mushu, Tinker Bell

### Gold
- Least abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Oathkeeper, Oblivion, Diamond Dust, One-Winged Angel, Ultima Weapon, Megalixir

1.0.1.title: KH RECOM AP v1.0.1

1.1.0.description:
- Added in all floor bosses besides Riku III (still bugged)
- Added EXP Multiplier
- Sleights can now be checks
- Wonderland - 100 Acre Wood are now shuffled

----------
### How to play (GBA COM):
1. Download the khcom.apworld file and connector_khcom.lua script
2. Place your khcom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
3. Place your connector_khcom.lua script in your lua folder (usually /data/lua/)
4. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe

8. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking

10. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
11. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe

13. Open Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories in BizHawk
14. On the title screen, navigate to Tools > LUA Console
15. In the LUA Console window, navigate to Script > Open Script
16. Open /data/lua/connector_khcom.lua
17. Confirm the script is running by verifying the script is listed in your active scripts and a green triangle appears before the script name
18. Play!

### How to play (RECOM):

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC Release via Epic Games Store and navigate to your KH_1.5_2.5 in the path box and click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check ReCoM plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure LUA backend", then click "Next".
- Ensure that "Launch via Epic Games" is checked and click "Next"
- Extract game data for ReCoM and any other AP game you play (KH2), then click "Next".
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Re:Chain of Memories"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-RECOM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your khrecom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts RE Chain of Memories.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KHRECOM Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

-  You begin the game as normal in Traverse Town on Floor 1.
- You start with a Key of Beginnings, Key of Guidance, and Key to Truth for Floor 1, as well as infinite (non-gold) map cards of each type and value.
- Collecting battle cards in the overworld WILL NOT ADD THEM TO YOUR INVENTORY.
- In GBA COM, story and card journal entries are checks
- In RECOM, opening Room of Beginnings, Room of Guidance, and Room of Truth on each floor as well as card journal entries, defeating heartless, and (optionally) acquiring sleights are checks.
- In RECOM, you must fight the between-floor bosses in order.  They will not appear otherwise.
- You are allowed to warp to any floor at the start.
- Floors which you don't have unlocked are simply assigned Traverse Town.
- If card packs are on (GBA ONLY), some locations hold card packs, which are the only way to obtain battle cards. These card packs come in three varieties: bronze, silver, and gold
- If card sets are on, some locations locations hold sets of specific cards (Kingdom Key 4-6 for example).  These are the only way to obtain battle cards.
- Friend cards (Aladdin, Ariel, Beast, Donald, Goofy, Jack, Peter Pan, Pluto (RECOM)) are randomly placed at checks. 
- In GBA COM, when you have found all 7 friend cards, F13 is opened.  Defeat Final Marluxia on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- In RECOM, when you have found all 8 friend cards and defeated all floor bosses, F13 is opened.  Defeat Final Marluxia on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- In RECOM, these friend cards are tracked in your journal instead of your inventory.

----------

### (RECOM) All of my cards are missing!
RECOM works by parsing the items from the client in real time, you must have the client open and connected to progress.  As soon as you reconnect, you'll see your items again and won't have lost any progress. 

### (RECOM) I have an error on startup.
If you receive an error when starting you game, ensure that your paths in KH_1.5_2.5/LuaBackend.toml have quotes around them, both for RECOM and any other game that lists paths for scripts.  If not, please add them.

### (RECOM) I want to play vanilla again.
If you want to return the game to its original state, uninstall the mod via OpenKH.

----------

### (GBA) Card Packs:
### Bronze
- Most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Kingdom Key, Three Wishes, Pumpkinhead, Olympia, Wishing Star, Lady Luck, Potion, Hi-Potion, Ether, Fire, Blizzard, Thunder, Simba, Genie, Cloud, Dumbo

### Silver
- Second most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Lionheart, Metal Chocobo, Spellbinder, Divine Rose, Crabclaw, Mega-Potion, Elixir, Mega-Ether, Cure, Stop, Gravity, Aero, Bambi, Mushu, Tinker Bell

### Gold
- Least abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Oathkeeper, Oblivion, Diamond Dust, One-Winged Angel, Ultima Weapon, Megalixir

14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KHRECOM Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

-  You begin the game as normal in Traverse Town on Floor 1.
- You start with a Key of Beginnings, Key of Guidance, and Key to Truth for Floor 1, as well as infinite (non-gold) map cards of each type and value.
- Collecting battle cards in the overworld WILL NOT ADD THEM TO YOUR INVENTORY.
- In GBA COM, story and card journal entries are checks
- In RECOM, opening Room of Beginnings, Room of Guidance, and Room of Truth on each floor as well as card journal entries, defeating heartless, and (optionally) acquiring sleights are checks.
- In RECOM, you must fight the between-floor bosses in order.  They will not appear otherwise.
- You are allowed to warp to any floor at the start.
- Floors which you don't have unlocked are simply assigned Traverse Town.
- If card packs are on (GBA ONLY), some locations hold card packs, which are the only way to obtain battle cards. These card packs come in three varieties: bronze, silver, and gold
- If card sets are on, some locations locations hold sets of specific cards (Kingdom Key 4-6 for example).  These are the only way to obtain battle cards.
- Friend cards (Aladdin, Ariel, Beast, Donald, Goofy, Jack, Peter Pan, Pluto (RECOM)) are randomly placed at checks. 
- In GBA COM, when you have found all 7 friend cards, F13 is opened.  Defeat Final Marluxia on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- In RECOM, when you have found all 8 friend cards and defeated all floor bosses, F13 is opened.  Defeat Final Marluxia on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- In RECOM, these friend cards are tracked in your journal instead of your inventory.

----------

### (RECOM) All of my cards are missing!
RECOM works by parsing the items from the client in real time, you must have the client open and connected to progress.  As soon as you reconnect, you'll see your items again and won't have lost any progress. 

### (RECOM) I have an error on startup.
If you receive an error when starting you game, ensure that your paths in KH_1.5_2.5/LuaBackend.toml have quotes around them, both for RECOM and any other game that lists paths for scripts.  If not, please add them.

### (RECOM) I want to play vanilla again.
If you want to return the game to its original state, uninstall the mod via OpenKH.

----------

### (GBA) Card Packs:
### Bronze
- Most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Kingdom Key, Three Wishes, Pumpkinhead, Olympia, Wishing Star, Lady Luck, Potion, Hi-Potion, Ether, Fire, Blizzard, Thunder, Simba, Genie, Cloud, Dumbo

### Silver
- Second most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Lionheart, Metal Chocobo, Spellbinder, Divine Rose, Crabclaw, Mega-Potion, Elixir, Mega-Ether, Cure, Stop, Gravity, Aero, Bambi, Mushu, Tinker Bell

### Gold
- Least abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Oathkeeper, Oblivion, Diamond Dust, One-Winged Angel, Ultima Weapon, Megalixir
1.1.2.title: KH RECOM AP v1.1.2

1.1.3.description:
- Fixed instances where multiple RECOM players could have the same world layout
----------
### How to play (GBA COM):
1. Download the khcom.apworld file and connector_khcom.lua script
2. Place your khcom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
3. Place your connector_khcom.lua script in your lua folder (usually /data/lua/)
4. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
5. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
6. Find "Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
7. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
8. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
9. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
10. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
11. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
12. Click "KHCOM Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
13. Open Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories in BizHawk
14. On the title screen, navigate to Tools > LUA Console
15. In the LUA Console window, navigate to Script > Open Script
16. Open /data/lua/connector_khcom.lua
17. Confirm the script is running by verifying the script is listed in your active scripts and a green triangle appears before the script name
18. Play!

### How to play (RECOM):

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC Release via Epic Games Store and navigate to your KH_1.5_2.5 in the path box and click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check ReCoM plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure LUA backend", then click "Next".
- Ensure that "Launch via Epic Games" is checked and click "Next"
- Extract game data for ReCoM and any other AP game you play (KH2), then click "Next".
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Re:Chain of Memories"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-RECOM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your khrecom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts RE Chain of Memories.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KHRECOM Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

-  You begin the game as normal in Traverse Town on Floor 1.
- You start with a Key of Beginnings, Key of Guidance, and Key to Truth for Floor 1, as well as infinite (non-gold) map cards of each type and value.
- Collecting battle cards in the overworld WILL NOT ADD THEM TO YOUR INVENTORY.
- In GBA COM, story and card journal entries are checks
- In RECOM, opening Room of Beginnings, Room of Guidance, and Room of Truth on each floor as well as card journal entries, defeating heartless, and (optionally) acquiring sleights are checks.
- In RECOM, you must fight the between-floor bosses in order.  They will not appear otherwise.
- You are allowed to warp to any floor at the start.
- Floors which you don't have unlocked are simply assigned Traverse Town.
- If card packs are on (GBA ONLY), some locations hold card packs, which are the only way to obtain battle cards. These card packs come in three varieties: bronze, silver, and gold
- If card sets are on, some locations locations hold sets of specific cards (Kingdom Key 4-6 for example).  These are the only way to obtain battle cards.
- Friend cards (Aladdin, Ariel, Beast, Donald, Goofy, Jack, Peter Pan, Pluto (RECOM)) are randomly placed at checks. 
- In GBA COM, when you have found all 7 friend cards, F13 is opened.  Defeat Final Marluxia on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- In RECOM, when you have found all 8 friend cards and defeated all floor bosses, F13 is opened.  Defeat Final Marluxia on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- In RECOM, these friend cards are tracked in your journal instead of your inventory.

----------

### (RECOM) All of my cards are missing!
RECOM works by parsing the items from the client in real time, you must have the client open and connected to progress.  As soon as you reconnect, you'll see your items again and won't have lost any progress. 

### (RECOM) I have an error on startup.
If you receive an error when starting you game, ensure that your paths in KH_1.5_2.5/LuaBackend.toml have quotes around them, both for RECOM and any other game that lists paths for scripts.  If not, please add them.

### (RECOM) I want to play vanilla again.
If you want to return the game to its original state, uninstall the mod via OpenKH.

----------

### (GBA) Card Packs:
### Bronze
- Most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Kingdom Key, Three Wishes, Pumpkinhead, Olympia, Wishing Star, Lady Luck, Potion, Hi-Potion, Ether, Fire, Blizzard, Thunder, Simba, Genie, Cloud, Dumbo

### Silver
- Second most abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Lionheart, Metal Chocobo, Spellbinder, Divine Rose, Crabclaw, Mega-Potion, Elixir, Mega-Ether, Cure, Stop, Gravity, Aero, Bambi, Mushu, Tinker Bell

### Gold
- Least abundant
- Contains 3 cards of any numeric value of the following types: Oathkeeper, Oblivion, Diamond Dust, One-Winged Angel, Ultima Weapon, Megalixir
1.1.3.title: KH RECOM AP v.1.1.3

1.2.0.description:
- Sleights are now randomized in both location and items.
- Card sets now contain all card values of that card type (For example Card Set Fire gives Fire 0-9)
- Zeroes option now allows disabling all 0s in card sets, as opposed to removing 0 sets from the item pool.
- Riku II was removed again due to sleight randomization.  This makes the floor both order 1F Axel I > 6F Larxene I > 7F Riku I > 10F Vexen I > 12F Riku IV > 12F Larxene II
- Heartless checks have tripled, granting a check for slaying 1, 2, and 3 heartless of each variation.
- Added a setting to manipulate Sora's attack power, making all attacks stronger or weaker for the run.
- Some bug fixes.
----------

1.2.0.title: KH RECOM AP v1.2.0

1.2.1.description:
- Fixed a bug where Megalixir 9 wouldn't get added to the players inventory
- Renamed some confusing location names
- Added a setting to toggle whether the player should start with 3 world cards or not.
----------
### How to play (RECOM):

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.

- Ensure that "Launch via Epic Games" is checked and click "Next"
- Extract game data for ReCoM and any other AP game you play (KH2), then click "Next".
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Re:Chain of Memories"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-RECOM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your khrecom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer

1.2.1.title: KH RECOM AP v.1.2.1

1.3.0.description:
- Added settings to allow players to decide how many Enemy Cards or Sleights are shuffled into the pool
- Added settings to allow players to exclude certain Battle Cards, Enemy Cards, or Sleights from being shuffled into the pool
- Added settings to determine which card values are contained in card sets, and how they stack consecutively
- On the lua side, adding Friend Card tracking on Deck 3.  Black bordered friends have not been found, while green bordered friends have been found.
----------

1.3.0.title: KH RECOM AP v1.3.0

1.4.0.description:
- Added back in all boss battles, as I have found a way to circumvent their bugs.  Exit Hall bosses must still be completed in order:
    - 1F  Exit Hall Axel I
    - 6F  Exit Hall Larxene I
    - 7F  Exit Hall Riku I
    - 8F  Exit Hall Riku II
    - 10F Exit Hall Vexen I
    - 11F Exit Hall Riku III
    - 12F Exit Hall Riku IV
    - 12F Exit Hall Larxene IV
- Put all locations in location groups with a name corresponding to their world name.  Heartless checks are in groups called Heartless1, Heartless2, Heartless3 which allow for easy exclusions.
- Fixed a logic bug with Barrel Spider checks
- Added code on the lua side so that story events won't remove your friends.
- Created `gaithernOrg/KH-RECOM-AP-LUA-LEGACY-4` for legacy games rolled before this update
----------
### How to play (RECOM):

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend.

RECOM works by parsing the items from the client in real time, you must have the client open and connected to progress.  As soon as you reconnect, you'll see your items again and won't have lost any progress. 

### I have an error on startup.
If you receive an error when starting you game, ensure that your paths in KH_1.5_2.5/LuaBackend.toml have quotes around them, both for RECOM and any other game that lists paths for scripts.  If not, please add them.

### I want to play vanilla again.
If you want to return the game to its original state, uninstall the mod via OpenKH.
1.4.0.title: KH RECOM AP v.1.4.0

1.4.1.description:
- Fix starting worlds option
----------
### How to play (RECOM):

1. Install OpenKH and the LUA Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC Release via Epic Games Store and navigate to your KH_1.5_2.5 in the path box and click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check ReCoM plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure LUA backend", then click "Next".
- Ensure that "Launch via Epic Games" is checked and click "Next"
- Extract game data for ReCoM and any other AP game you play (KH2), then click "Next".
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Re:Chain of Memories"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-RECOM-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your khrecom.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts RE Chain of Memories.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads/
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KHRECOM Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

-  You begin the game as normal in Traverse Town on Floor 1.
- You start with a Key of Beginnings, Key of Guidance, and Key to Truth for Floor 1, as well as infinite (non-gold) map cards of each type and value.
- Collecting battle cards in the overworld WILL NOT ADD THEM TO YOUR INVENTORY.
- Opening Room of Beginnings, Room of Guidance, and Room of Truth on each floor as well as card journal entries, defeating heartless, and (optionally) acquiring sleights are checks.
- You must fight the exit hall bosses in order.  They will not appear otherwise.
- You are allowed to warp to any floor at the start.
- Floors which you don't have unlocked are simply assigned Traverse Town.
- Some locations locations hold sets of specific cards (Card Set Kingdom Key for example).  These are the only way to obtain battle cards.
- Friend cards (Aladdin, Ariel, Beast, Donald, Goofy, Jack, Peter Pan, Pluto) are randomly placed at checks. 
- When you have found all 8 friend cards and defeated all floor bosses, F13 is opened.  Defeat Final Marluxia on F13 and receive the Victory item to win.
- These friend cards are tracked in your journal instead of your inventory.

----------

### All of my cards are missing!
RECOM works by parsing the items from the client in real time, you must have the client open and connected to progress.  As soon as you reconnect, you'll see your items again and won't have lost any progress. 

### I have an error on startup.
If you receive an error when starting you game, ensure that your paths in KH_1.5_2.5/LuaBackend.toml have quotes around them, both for RECOM and any other game that lists paths for scripts.  If not, please add them.

### I want to play vanilla again.
If you want to return the game to its original state, uninstall the mod via OpenKH.
